channel.title: Offering Free Forum & Site hosting for your Private Server
channel.description:
Well, today got me thinking, I have a dedicated server, so why not use it?
Here is what i can offer you:
[b] Free (Nothing to pay ever!) [/b] Space: 150mb (not much, but should do for a forum and site) Bandwidth: 30 gig Your choice of forum software, SMF, phpBB, vBulletin or ipb [i] I will do management for 10 posts on forum, non spam [/i] cPanel Control Panel
[b] What do i ask in return?[/b] Well, it would be good for a link back but it is not needed at the moment
Please PM me for your account to be setup, i am trying to help all that use smfforfree1/2/3/4.
note, this will have not ads or strings.
[b] What is Management? [/b]
If you are new to the web hosting world/ website design, i will happily install your forum software/ assist you with your site for 10 posts on the forum.
your site can be accesed by [code] http://yoursite.rune-private.com[/code]
Please PM me for your account be be setup and i will get back to you ;) Please don't abuse this service as i am only trying to help ;)

item.title: Offering Free Forum & Site hosting for your Private Server
item.dc:creator: @sriyegna sriyegna
item.description:
@sriyegna wrote:

XD also, there are many other free hosts, but they dont give u a subdomain like tht… there is like blah.hostname.com but they do let u set DNS

Read full topic
